title: residence领地插件圈地范围过小
author: BaoBaoLin
txt_content: 求解不知道怎么设置residence领地插件各个组的圈地范围，现在所有组的圈地范围都非常小，连10都圈不到，版本4.0.7.1

replies.author: 丶米饭
replies.txt_content:
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 100
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 100
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 256

应该是这3个，然后4.0.7.1的话我据说是有什么奇怪的bug..据说可以什么指令被删除领地数据，只是据说不确定

replies.author: kevinss
replies.txt_content: 从配置文件里设置一下最大圈地范围就可以了

replies.author: BaoBaoLin
replies.txt_content:
abc956812056 发表于 2016-5-8 15:40
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 100
    ...
这三个已经全设成256了圈地范围大小还是没变

replies.author: 毒药丶Dian
replies.txt_content: 通过后台配置文件里修改。用Notepad++打开配置文件。

replies.author: syrupofonlyone
replies.txt_content:
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 100
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 100
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 256   
全部跳成256就行了，分别是长宽高256x256x256
